root: ^Z speaks to player from off the screen commending them for defeating patient zero
^Felix walks onto screen and reveals to be Z
^Player tries to reason with Felix and get him to join the Mutated
^Felix (who has been given power and influence by the Abattoir) believes that the Abattoir is the path to succeeding, because people used to underestimate him in their old lives.
^Player says that treating people badly is never the solution
^Felix says they can't settle this with words, Power is the only real way to solve this dispute
